title: Ticket #1186: JobRouter crashes in some cases after failing to handle periodic exprs
description:
Craig Struble reports a JobRouter crash: 

*** Last 20 line(s) of file /opt/condor-7.4.1/local.sunpassage/log/JobRouterLog:
02/05 12:10:05 JobRouter (route=MSCS Pool): 0 submitted (max 400), 0 idle (max 100), throttle: 0.03 jobs/sec, recent stats: 0 started, 0 succeeded, 0 failed.
02/05 12:10:12 WriteUserLog::initialize: safe_open_wrapper("/home/frupcich/dag_raytrace/logs/pen_raytrace.log") failed - errno 2 (No such file or directory)
02/05 12:10:12 WriteUserLog::initialize: failed to open file
02/05 12:10:12 (252200.0) push_dirty_attributes: Failed to set EnteredCurrentStatus = 1265393412
02/05 12:10:12 push_dirty_attributes: Failed to commit changes
02/05 12:10:12 JobRouter failure (252200.0): failed to place job on hold.
02/05 12:10:12 JobRouter failure (src=252200.0,dest=252393.0): Unable to evaluate job's periodic policy expressions.
Stack dump for process 26030 at timestamp 1265393412 (12 frames) condor_job_router(dprintf_dump_stack+0xb7)[0x561735]
condor_job_router(_Z18linux_sig_coredumpi+0x2c)[0x55302e]
/lib64/libpthread.so.0[0x3ac960e930]
condor_job_router(_ZN7classad8ExprTree8CopyFromERKS0_+0x5)[0x869b75]
condor_job_router(_ZN7classad7ClassAd13CopyFromChainERKS0_+0x2b)[0x85283b]
condor_job_router(_ZN9RoutedJob11SetSrcJobAdEPKcPN7classad7ClassAdEPNS2_17ClassAdCollectionE+0x4f)[0x510317]
condor_job_router(_ZN9JobRouter26EvalAllSrcJobPeriodicExprsEv+0xd5)[0x51b42b]
condor_job_router(_ZN12TimerManager7TimeoutEv+0x24b)[0x55c9bb]
condor_job_router(_ZN10DaemonCore6DriverEv+0x82a)[0x53c5c4]
condor_job_router(main+0x18eb)[0x5552dd]
/lib64/libc.so.6(__libc_start_main+0xf4)[0x3ac8a1d994]
condor_job_router(__gxx_personality_v0+0x439)[0x506df9]
*** End of file JobRouterLog

My guess is that orig_ad is NULL in JobRouter::EvalAllSrcJobPeriodicExprs(). If so, then it appears that this problem was introduced in [13748].
